page.title: 02POPULATION etc.
page.content: {POLITICS}The area is in EAST LOTHIAN District Council and in Berwick and E.Lothian Parliamentary Constituency. There is no Community Council. {POPULATION}Total population at the 1981 Census was 3950. 590 were 5-16. Women seem to live longer. 1240 women were over 60 and only 214 men were over 65. The population was in 1421 households. {LAW AND ORDER}The area beat is covered by Prestonpans Station. Assistance from Tranent or Musselburgh or CID or Dog Handlers would be given if required. There is a community police -man. Most crimes are by the 15-21 group. Vandalism is the most noticeable. Greater use of foot patrols, computers and modern communication methods are hoped for.
